                                                                                                                                              • Firebird's Tarsi
                                                                                                                                              • (2) Set:
                                                                                                                                              • When you die, a meteor falls from the sky and revives you. This effect has a 300 second cooldown.
                                                                                                                                              • (4) Set:
                                                                                                                                              • Your Fire Spells cause up to 3 enemies to explode, dealing 400% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 10 yards.
                                                                                                                                              • (6) Set:
                                                                                                                                              • Dealing Fire damage causes the enemy to take the same amount of damage over 3 seconds, stacking up to 3000% weapon damage as Fire per second. After reaching 3000% damage per second, the enemy will burn until they die.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • (2) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Damaging enemies with Arcane, Cold, Fire or Lightning will cause a Meteor of the same damage type to fall from the sky. There is an 8 second cooldown for each damage type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • (4) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Attacks increase your resistance to that damage type by 100% for 6 seconds.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • (6) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Attacks increase your damage by 150% for 6 seconds. Arcane, Cold, Fire, and Lightning attacks each add one stack. Adding a stack refreshes the duration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Legendary Helm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 360-397

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Armor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Primary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Attack Speed Increased by 5.0-6.0%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • 5-10% more Fire damage taken.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Secondary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +150-200 Poison Resistance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Attacks release a Poison Nova that deals 350-450% weapon damage as Poison to enemies within 10 yards.


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • One of 7 Magic Properties (varies)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Physical skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Lightning skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Cold skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Fire skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Arcane skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Poison skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Holy skills deal 15-20% more damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • When you die, a meteor falls from the sky and revives you. This effect has a 300 second cooldown.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • (4) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Your Fire Spells cause up to 3 enemies to explode, dealing 400% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 10 yards.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • (6) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Dealing Fire damage causes the enemy to take the same amount of damage over 3 seconds, stacking up to 3000% weapon damage as Fire per second. After reaching 3000% damage per second, the enemy will burn until they die.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Reduces damage from Cold attacks by 7-10%.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Secondary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Gain immunity to Freeze and Immobilize effects.


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • One of 3 Magic Properties (varies)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • +220-349 Dexterity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • +220-349 Strength

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • +220-349 Intelligence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • +3 Random Magic Properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Account Bound
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Unique Equipped
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Affix Ratio: 5-2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Immortal King's Boulder Breaker Level: 60
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 2-Hand
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Barbarian
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Set Two-Handed Mighty Weapon
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 1030.0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Damage Per Second

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 982-1078 Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • 1.00 Attacks per Second

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Primary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • +495-787 Strength

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Increases Call of the Ancients Damage by 45-60% (Barbarian Only)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Secondary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ignores Durability Loss


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • One of 7 Magic Properties (varies)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Arcane Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Poison Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Lightning Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Holy Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Cold Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Fire Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +(732-894)-(877-1111) Damage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • +3 Random Magic Properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Call
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Boulder Breaker
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Eternal Reign
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Irons
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Stature
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Stride
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Tribal Binding
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Immortal King's Triumph
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • (2) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Call of the Ancients last until they die.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • (4) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Reduce the cooldown of Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients by 3 seconds for every 10 Fury you spend with an attack.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • (6) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • While both Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients is active, you deal 100% increased damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Gain the base effect of all four Mantras at all times.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Your generators, Elemental Arrow, Chakram, Impale, Multishot, and Cluster Arrow deal 100% increased damage for every active Sentry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • When you block, you have up to a 15-20% chance to Stun the attacker for 1.5 seconds based on your current Wrath.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Gain 20% damage reduction and deal 20% increased damage for 4 seconds if no enemy is within 10 yards of you.

After reaching 3000% damage per second, the enemy will burn until they die.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Attack Speed Increased by 15.0-20.0%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • During Whirlwind you gain 40% damage reduction.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • (6) Set:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Whirlwind gains the effect of the Dust Devils rune and Dust Devils damage is increased to 2500% weapon damage.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Primary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • +240-269 Dexterity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Attack Speed Increased by 15.0-20.0%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Secondary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Elemental Arrow - Ball Lightning now travels at 30-40% speed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Molten Wildebeest's Gizzard Level: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Regenerates 10000 Life per Second.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • After not taking damage for 4 seconds, gain an absorb shield for 200% of your total Life per Second.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       • Increase the damage of Rend by 500% and its duration to 15 seconds.

Arcane, Cold, Fire, and Lightning attacks each add one stack. Adding a stack refreshes the duration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Lightning damage has a 25-35% chance to Stun for 1.5 seconds.
